```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(ggridges)
library(viridis)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
# read in the data
mental_url = "https://data.cdc.gov/api/views/6vp6-wxuq/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD"
mental = 
  read.csv(url(mental_url)) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  filter(measure == "Mental health not good for >=14 days among adults aged >=18 Years" | measure == "Obesity among adults aged >=18 Years" | measure == "Diagnosed diabetes among adults aged >=18 Years" | measure == "Binge drinking among adults aged >=18 Years" | measure == "Cancer (excluding skin cancer) among adults aged >=18 Years ")
```
